title: 10 year anniversary gift
body: I still haven't received my skin from riot, I checked purchase history where it shows that I received the icon, but I already owned the riot kayle skin and I have not gotten my mystery skin. I was wondering if this was happening to anyone else or know the answer to my problem.

replies.body:
I had the same experience; reached out to support, was told (as you were here) that I didn't have the skin prior (and it's possible â€“ I could be misremembering, although I don't think I am), asked to be sent confirmation of the records they used to show that (as it wasn't in purchase history), got fobbed off and told to email the privacy address.

Pretty poor customer service, all told, I'm afraid. If support have the data to prove the skin was awarded as part of the gift (or to show the date Riot Kayle was otherwise added to the account), they should be able to directly share that in the ticket...

It looks like you received Riot Kayle as part of the 10-year Anniversary event. If you'd like to reach out to our specialists about this, feel free to reach out in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any other questions.

It's time you contact Player Support, they will be able to add the mystery skin, if it's missing.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
